info.title: Indian Post
info.description: Using this API anyone can get the information of Indian Post's Speed post consignment, just give consignment id(itemno) as input and get the whole details, also get the pincodes search feature, spread the word with your friends who are interested in this.

get.description: Just enter the pincode and look for available post offices in that area.
Get the pincodes of any place in India by just giving the office or location name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the location or office for which pincodes are needed.

get.description: Track any Indian Post's Speed Post by giving consignment Id.

parameters.name: itemno
parameters.description: Item Number or Consignment Id for which tracking info is needed.
